description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget 'NotificationsScreen' which displays a list of notification items along with a switch to enable or disable notifications. The widget interacts with the application state via Provider to toggle notification settings and renders static notification messages with icons and styled text.

classes.name: _NotificationItem
classes.description: A data class representing individual notification items with title, message, icon, and color.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the NotificationsScreen, including a toggle switch and a list of notification items.
